short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace all human words with akkaridion ones

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to change standard time units to Akkaridion Scientific Calendar Units.

Complete list of changes:
Hour >> Horvath
Year >> Kelton
Minute >> Mekron
Min >> Mek 
Millisecond >> Milliseckton
Nanosecond >> Nanosekton
Microsecond >> Mirkrosekton
Monday >> Meksoldelson
Tuesday >> Tydelson
Thursday >> Thadelson
Friday >> Fradelson
Saturday >> Setdelson
Sunday >> Galendelson
Day >> Delson
Second >> Sekton
Earth >> Akkaridion V
The sun >> Sol

Update 0.1.1: Fixed errors with text replacement in words that contained Min/Sec
